title: Data Catalog Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating data catalog entries, including datasets and datasetSeries.

datasets.description: One or more data catalog blocks can exist in an array. Each block contains `dataset` and `datasetSeries` objects.

items.title: Dataset_objects
items.description: One item (i.e., one datset metadata) in the collection of datasets. This class describes a collection of homogeneous data characterized by its topic, process, infrastructure (including data processing and storage systems), purpose, and data type. A dataset is also consistent in terms of classification, the presence of personal data, and its degree of openness. Datasets are similar to products; they are prepared and made available to others under clearly defined usage criteria.

attributes.title: Dataset_metadata
attributes.description: Descriptive attributes for the dataset itself, i.e. the actual dataset metadata.

schema:image.title: Image_URL
schema:image.description: URL for an image to be displayed in the data catalog. Choose an image that is related to the dataset's content.

dcterms:identifier.title: Dataset_identifier
dcterms:identifier.description: Unique identifier for the dataset. If left empty, it is automatically assigned.

dcterms:description.title: Dataset_description
dcterms:description.description: Description of the dataset. Should go into details about the dataset content and help a non-specialist to understand what is the dataset about.

dcterms:accessRights.title: Access_rights
dcterms:accessRights.description: Defines the accessibility of the dataset (e.g., public, internal, etc.).

dcterms:publisher.title: Publisher
dcterms:publisher.description: Entity (person or organization) who published the dataset.

dcat:contactPoint.title: Contact_point
dcat:contactPoint.description: Contact information for potential inquiries about the dataset.

dcterms:issued.title: Issued_date
dcterms:issued.description: Date when the dataset was formally issued for the first time. If unknown, you may select the date of the first publication of this metadata.

dcterms:accrualPeriodicity.title: Accrual_periodicity
dcterms:accrualPeriodicity.description: Frequency with which dataset is updated (e.g., 'Annual').

dcterms:modified.title: Last_modification_date
dcterms:modified.description: Last modification date of the data in the dataset.

schema:OrganizationRole.title: Affiliated_persons
schema:OrganizationRole.description: List of affiliated people, their contact address and respective roles.

schema:roleName.title: Role
schema:roleName.description: Role this person has for this dataset.

bv:classification.title: Classification_level
bv:classification.description: Classification level of the dataset according to the Swiss Informationssicherheitsgesetz, ISG. For information regarding the categorization, consult the Swiss Informationssicherheitsgesetz article 13

bv:personalData.title: Categorization_DSG
bv:personalData.description: Categorization regarding the Swiss data protection act. For information regarding the categorization, consult the Swiss data protection act article 5.

bv:typeOfData.title: Data_type
bv:typeOfData.description: Specifies the type of data in the dataset (master data, reference data, thematic data or unstructured data).

bv:archivalValue.title: Archival_value
bv:archivalValue.description: Indicates if this dataset has archival value and must be sent to the BAR.

bv:opendata_swiss.title: opendataswiss_publication
bv:opendata_swiss.description: Indicates if the dataset must be published as Open Government Data (OGD) via the opendata.swiss portal. Optionally references the opendata.swiss publication ID.

bv:mustBePublished.title: opendataswiss_publication_flag
bv:mustBePublished.description: Indicates if the dataset must be published on opendata.swiss. May be used by harvesters or automatic metadata publication.

dcterms:identifier.title: opendataswiss_id
dcterms:identifier.description: Identifier for the dataset on opendata.swiss.

dcat:accessURL.title: opendataswiss_url
dcat:accessURL.description: URL for the dataset on opendata.swiss

bv:i14y.title: i14y_publication
bv:i14y.description: Indicates if the dataset metadata must be made available via the interoperability platform I14Y. Optionally references the I14Y publication ID.

bv:mustBePublished.title: i14y_publication_flag
bv:mustBePublished.description: Indicates if the dataset must be published on I14Y. May be used by harvesters or automatic metadata publication.

dcterms:identifier.title: i14y_id
dcterms:identifier.description: Identifier for the dataset on I14Y.

dcat:accessURL.title: i14y_url
dcat:accessURL.description: URL for the dataset on I14Y

dcat:themeTaxonomy.title: dataset_themes
dcat:themeTaxonomy.description: This attribute classifies the dataset into one or more broad thematics. Proper classification allow other users interested in the topic to find the dataset without knowing its name or description.

dcat:landingPage.title: Landing_page
dcat:landingPage.description: Landing page or homepage for the dataset.

dcterms:temporal.title: temporal_coverage
dcterms:temporal.description: Temporal coverage of the dataset. For example, the first and last measurement years for a timeseries.

dpv:hasLegalBasis.title: Legal_basis
dpv:hasLegalBasis.description: Legal basis for the dataset (as URI, e.g. 'https://www.fedlex.admin.ch/eli/oc/2022/491/de#art_5').

bv:retentionPeriod.title: retention_period
bv:retentionPeriod.description: Retention period for the dataset. That is, the time that the dataset must legally be available after the end of its active use.

dcat:catalog.title: catalog
dcat:catalog.description: Indicates in which catalog this dataset is available.

prov:wasDerivedFrom.title: derived_from
prov:wasDerivedFrom.description: Links to other datasets from which this dataset was derived.

bv:geoIdentifier.title: geo_identifier
bv:geoIdentifier.description: Identifier for the dataset according to the GeoIV.

foaf:page.title: Related_resources
foaf:page.description: Any related page, document or resource.

alias.title: page_alias
alias.description: Alias to be showed in the interface for this link.

uri.title: url
uri.description: URL for the page, document or resource

bv:abrogation.title: abrogation
bv:abrogation.description: Indicates when the dataset was abrogated or replaced.

bv:itSystem.title: it_system
bv:itSystem.description: Name of the IT system managing this dataset.

dcat:inSeries.title: in_series
dcat:inSeries.description: Reference to the series this dataset belongs to.

dcterms:replaces.title: replaces
dcterms:replaces.description: ID of datasets replaced by this one

dcat:distribution.title: Distribution
dcat:distribution.description: Distribution info describing how and where to access the dataset. This class describes a specific, final, and ready-to-use format in which a dataset is made available to users. For example, the same data may be available as both a CSV file and an Excel file, each representing a separate distribution of the same dataset. Each distribution must be part of a dataset and should point to a reachable source (e.g. an URL for download). All distributions within a dataset must maintain the same level of timeliness across all channels. This means, for instance, that the 2021 CSV file should be published simultaneously with the Excel file, and vice versa.

dcterms:identifier.title: Distribution_id
dcterms:identifier.description: Identifier for this distribution. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

dcat:accessURL.title: access_url
dcat:accessURL.description: URL to a page for accessing this distribution. This must not be a direct download URL but, for example, a link to a webpage containing download links.

dcterms:format.title: format
dcterms:format.description: File format for this distribution (e.g., CSV, JSON).

dcterms:modified.title: Last_modification_date
dcterms:modified.description: Last modification date of the data in this distribution.

dcat:downloadURL.title: download_url
dcat:downloadURL.description: Direct download URL of the distribution file. This link must directly point to the file.

dcterms:title.title: Distribution_title
dcterms:title.description: Title for the distribution, in multiple languages.

dcterms:description.title: Distribution_description
dcterms:description.description: Description for the distribution, in multiple languages.

dcterms:conformsTo.title: conforms_to
dcterms:conformsTo.description: Reference to a standard or specification the distribution conforms to.

dcterms:license.title: license
dcterms:license.description: License under which this distribution is released. This is mandatory for opendata.swiss publications.

dcat:accessService.title: access_service
dcat:accessService.description: Reference to a service used to provide access to the data.

datasetSeries.description: Container for dataset series keyed by an identifier such as 'SERIE-01'.

items.title: datasetseries_objects
items.description: Structure of each dataset series entry. Keys are series IDs (e.g. 'SERIE-01'). This class represents a collection of datasets that are published and can be used separately, but share some characteristics that group them.

attributes.description: Descriptive attributes for the dataset series.

schema:image.title: Image_URL
schema:image.description: URL for an image to be displayed in the data catalog. Choose an image that is related to the series content.

dcterms:identifier.title: Series_id
dcterms:identifier.description: Identifier for this DatasetSeries. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

dcterms:title.title: Series_title
dcterms:title.description: Title for the series in multiple languages.

dcterms:description.title: Series_description
dcterms:description.description: Description for the series in multiple languages.

dcat:contactPoint.title: Contact_point
dcat:contactPoint.description: Contact information for potential inquiries about the DatasetSeries.

dcterms:publisher.title: Publisher
dcterms:publisher.description: Publisher or organization responsible for the series.

dcat:dataset.title: series_dataset
dcat:dataset.description: References which dataset(s) are grouped within this DatasetSeries. Please note that a Dataset may be referenced by multiple DatasetSeries.

foaf:page.title: Related_resources
foaf:page.description: Any related page, document or resource.

alias.title: page_alias
alias.description: Alias to be showed in the interface for this link.

uri.title: url
uri.description: URL for the page, document or resource

schema:comment.title: comments
schema:comment.description: Additional comments or notes about the DatasetSeries.

bv:classification.title: Classification_level
bv:classification.description: Classification level of the dataset according to the Swiss Informationssicherheitsgesetz, ISG. For information regarding the categorization, consult the Swiss Informationssicherheitsgesetz article 13

bv:personalData.title: Categorization_DSG
bv:personalData.description: Categorization regarding the Swiss data protection act. For information regarding the categorization, consult the Swiss data protection act article 5.

items.title: dataServices_objects
items.description: A DataService represents a collection of operations accessible through an interface (API) that provide access to one or more datasets or data processing functions.

schema:image.title: Image_URL
schema:image.description: URL for an image to be displayed in the data catalog. Choose an image that is related to the datasets content.

dcterms:identifier.title: Service_id
dcterms:identifier.description: Identifier for this DataService. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

dcterms:title.title: dataService_title
dcterms:title.description: Title for the DataService in multiple languages.

dcterms:description.title: dataService_description
dcterms:description.description: Description for the series in multiple languages.

dcterms:publisher.title: Publisher
dcterms:publisher.description: Publisher or organization responsible for the DataService.

dcat:contactPoint.title: Contact_point
dcat:contactPoint.description: Contact information for potential inquiries about the DataService.

dcterms:accessRights.title: Access_rights
dcterms:accessRights.description: Defines the accessibility of the DataService (e.g., public, internal, etc.).

dcat:endopointURL.title: endpoint_url
dcat:endopointURL.description: URL of the technical endpoint of the DataService.

dcat:servesDataset.title: serves_dataset
dcat:servesDataset.description: IDs of the datasets served by this DataService

dcat:endpointDescription.title: endpoint_description
dcat:endpointDescription.description: URL of technical documentation of the DataService, such as for example a Swagger documentation.

foaf:page.title: Related_resources
foaf:page.description: Any related page, document or resource.

alias.title: page_alias
alias.description: Alias to be showed in the interface for this link.

uri.title: url
uri.description: URL for the page, document or resource

items.title: catalog_objects
items.description: Structure of Catalog. A catalog is a loose collection of Datasets, DatasetSeries and DataServices such as, for example, opendata.swiss or I14Y.

schema:image.title: Image_URL
schema:image.description: URL for an image to be displayed in the data catalog. Choose an image that is related to the datasets content.

dcterms:identifier.title: Catalog_id
dcterms:identifier.description: Identifier for this Catalog. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

dcterms:title.title: Catalog_title
dcterms:title.description: Title for the Catalog in multiple languages.

dcterms:description.title: Catalog_description
dcterms:description.description: Description for the Catalog in multiple languages.

dcterms:publisher.title: Publisher
dcterms:publisher.description: Publisher or organization responsible for the Catalog.

dcat:contactPoint.title: Contact_point
dcat:contactPoint.description: Contact information for potential inquiries about the Catalog.

dcterms:accessRights.title: Access_rights
dcterms:accessRights.description: Defines the accessibility of the Catalog (e.g., public, internal, etc.).

dcat:dataset.title: catalog_datasets
dcat:dataset.description: IDs of the datasets referenced in the Catalog.

dcat:service.title: catalog_services
dcat:service.description: IDs of the DataServices referenced in the catalog
